amendment.description: An amendment numbered 43 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds from being used to implement, administer, or enforce Executive Order 14019, except sections 7, 8, and 10.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 207 - 206 (Roll no. 289).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 207 - 206 (Roll no. 289).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
